refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns the direction vector using the provided azimuth and elevation (AE).

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: Returns the direction vector using the provided azimuth and elevation as input. The -i option results in the angles supplied being interpreted as increments. See also the viewdir and qvrot commands.

refsection.title: EXAMPLES
refsection.para: The example shows the use of the ae2dir command to get the direction vector.

example.title: Find the direction vector using the provided azimuth and elevation.
example.para: Returns the direction vector using an azimuth of 35 and elevation of 25.
